Name: Snake vs Snake
About the game: Snake vs Snake is a fast paced snake game with an insane battle mode with power-ups, boss fights and much more. Inspired by old classical Snake but with a much faster arcade pace and local multiplayer support. Local Multiplayer 1 - 6 Players can battle it out in the battle mode. Use power-ups to defeat the other Snakes. Got no one to play with? Don't worry you can play against Snake AI players. Online Multiplayer? The game itself doesn't support multiplayer but works well with services like Parsec where you can play online with your friends. Leaderboard Compete with other players from around the world and reach the #1 spot. Prove once and for all that you are the best Snake player in the world. Classical Endless Mode Fun like in the good old days; just keep going as long as you can. Level Mode Beat puzzle inspired levels by collecting all apples. Don't hit any of the walls. Sounds easy? Well it's not as easy as it sounds! Speed Run Support Beat all levels as fast as possible and see if you can become the fastest player in the world. Controls Works with gamepad & keyboard, yes 4 players on the same keyboard, it's crazy but fun :)
